title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        Children holding up hand made masks. NPS Photo       Junior Ranger Program Visit our Jr. Ranger Program Page for more information and a copy of the Junior Ranger Book.   Special Junior Ranger Hikes Junior Ranger Hikes are typically offered throughout the summer months.  See our calendar page for specfic dates and times.   Kids' Archeology Day Annual Kids' Archeology Day takes place in early August, with American Indian crafts, games and a sand box dig. Check our calendar page for the date and time this year.       What do Archeologists do? What kinds of jobs and careers are they working at? This article from the Society for American Archeologists Record from May of 2011 provides 12 personal accounts that prove archeologists do much more than digging. If you are interested in the field of archeology check this site. Archeology Jobs         Children digging for artifacts in sandbox demonstration at Kids Archeology Day. NPS Photo        Kids Archeology Day sandbox dig. NPS Photo        American Indian Games on Children's Archaeology Day NPS Photo
